putting sound waves to your vision

Hi. Nice to meet you!

I'm Manny Marx and I like to make stuff. For example this website also the desk I'm sitting at while I'm making this website. However what I really like to do is make music, especially with people. Whether it be musical collaboration or crafting music and sounds for a person's vision, I love it. In fact, I'd say I'm pretty good at it, too. But hey, don't take my word for it, check out what people who I have worked with have to say.

don't take my word for it

What I make sounds for

*but not limited to

Music Production

a soft lullaby, an action-packed chase scene, or a mysterious forest from a lost kingdom shrouded in a choking darkness,

I'll write it.

Sound Design

clicks, presses, swipes, footsteps, busy streets, or an intergalactic being from the depths of the crab nebula,

I'll make it.

Collaboration

songwriting, beat making, remixing, and sampling. Also playing the role as voice actor or as a session musician,

I got you.

Entertainment Media

with copious amounts of time participating in all forms of media from social networking websites to podcasts to video games (my favorite of the bunch). If there is a sound to be made for them,

I'll craft it

How the process all goes down

Well, first contact me at the bottom of the page and I'll get back to you as soon as I can. From there we can set up our first meeting via Skype, G-chat, phone, face-to-face, or just stick to email, whichever you'd perfer. If possible, please provide a few reference materials (audio, visual, etc.) to help with my research and creation process. Soon after I'll provide you with a demo (sfree of charge) and we can take it from there.
